product.name: Hello Kitty
product.description: Anthropomorphized white cat with a red bow and no visible mouth.

product.name: My Melody
product.description: White rabbit character depicted as always wearing a bright red or pink hood that covers her ears.

product.name: Kuromi
product.description: White rabbit character wearing a black jester's hat with a pink skull on the front and a black "devil" tail in the place of a normal rabbit's tail.

product.name: Unicorno
product.description: Unicorn character found a hidden magical kingdom.

product.name: Punkstar
product.description: Characters that are a band of neighborhood kids that got together to restore an abandoned karaoke machine factory into the ULTIMATE hangout.

product.name: Cinnamoroll
product.description: Character depicted as a white dog with a curly tail that resembles a cinnamon roll, and long ears he can fly with.

product.name: Gudetama
product.description: Character that is an anthropomorphized egg yolk whose main trait is laziness.

product.name: Aggressive Retsuko
product.description: Female red panda character portrayed as an administrative assistant in a Japanese business, relieving the stress of an oppressive and frustrating working life by drinking and singing angry death metal in a karaoke bar.

product.name: Ichigoman
product.description: Character depicted with strawberry ears and a red superhero suit.

product.name: Keroppi
product.description: Frog character with large eyes and a V-shaped mouth.
